name: Terrestrial
description: Earth is at its point where it is irreversibly destroyed by climate change and no longer habitable to human life. So now the only choice is to escape and find the next planet to survive on. But which one? That's where you come in. Use your knowledge and skills to find the next best planet for humanity to thrive. If you don't survive, humanity will die. Will you be able to give humanity a second chance?
